name: opencode-copilot-messages
description: OpenCode plugin for Copilot Claude via Anthropic Messages API (/v1/messages)

scripts.clean:dist: bun -e "import { rm } from 'node:fs/promises'; await rm('dist', { recursive: true, force: true })"
scripts.preflight: bun test && bun run typecheck && bun run lint
scripts.release:patch: bun run preflight && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: bun run preflight && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: bun run preflight && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
